channel.title: Help, Graphics Problem
channel.description:
Well whenever I play Audition (dancing game thing like DDR) my computer's graphics get messed up and I have to restart to get it back to normal. When the graphics do get messed up it says something like this
The ialmrnt 5 display driver has stopped working normaly.Save your work and reboot your system to restore full display functionality .The next time you reboot the machine a dialogue will be displayed giving u a chance to upload data about this failure to microsoft.
Can someone tell me how to fix this? Also I'll edit what it says after I can see it again.

item.title: Help, Graphics Problem
item.dc:creator: @dontaskmemyname dontaskmemyname
item.description:
@dontaskmemyname wrote:

Well thanks for the help anyway. (I’m still looking :|)

Read full topic

item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Keep searching the net. There will be something that will help you.

Read full topic

item.title: Help, Graphics Problem
item.dc:creator: @dontaskmemyname dontaskmemyname
item.description:
@dontaskmemyname wrote:

Thanks! I think that helped, but I haven’t tried yet so I’ll see what happens.

Edit: I think it did work, but after 2nd round of playing Audition I clicked and it turned out like a T.V. screen, but anyway I think if I just don’t click it’ll work so thanks

Read full topic

hi! i have windows xp, i have been trying to play this game for a while (tomb raider angel of darkness if it makes a difference) but after i've been...
